document.full_text: in an attempt to get his first career triple-double tuesday against the bulls, wizards center javale mcgee showed poor judgment by taking a few ill-advised shots, then looked even worse when he achieved the feat.
document.title: javale mcgee's unusual triple-double
lines_and_colors: in an attempt to get his first career triple-double tuesday against the bulls, wizards center javale mcgee showed poor judgment by taking a few ill-advised shots, then looked even worse when he achieved the feat.
